title: Microsoft Windows 3.11 (swe) - For DOSBox ~ Team ZOiT
description:
Microsoft Windows 3.11 (swe) For DOSBox

~About~

This is a hard disk drive image of Windows 3.11 for DOSBox 0.72.

~Install~

You must first have DOSBox 0.72 installed. Download DOSBox here http://www.dosbox.com, or check out our other torrents.

If you did not download this folder (the one named Win311swe and everything under it) to the root of C, move it there.

Run DOSBox, type (without quotes) "Mount C: C:Win311swe" [Enter] "C:" [Enter] "CD Drive" [Enter] "CD Windows" [Enter] "Win" [Enter]. Windows 3.11 should now boot. 

~Shoutz~

a128 for the disks

Quality releases deserve to be seeded!

Enjoy,
~ZOiT
